stories.text:
I use Harvest for invoicing my freelance clients, but also want to use something a bit better than a calendar. I'm currently using Forecast, which Harvest makes, but like EVERYTHING else in the productivity/business world it's made for teams. I'm looking for apps that are designed for freelancers.

Anything?
stories.title: Are there any work scheduling apps like Forecast designed for Freelancers?

stories.text: There are a lot of resources and books availabe now for learn ing iOS development, but I cannot find a good book or series of tutorials for macOS development with SwiftUI. Any hints?
stories.title: Ask HN: Good resources for learning macOS development with SwiftUI
